definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to perform conjuring tricks/to conjure/to juggle
hat trick (when one player scores three goals)

sentences.english: Or a juggler hates a shove.
This cantrip cannot duplicate the effect of any other power.
sentences.chinese: 这个戏法无法复制任何其他威能的效果。

sentences.english: They were watching me as they would watch a conjurer about to perform a trick.
sentences.chinese: 他们看着我，就想看着魔术师变戏法一样。

sentences.english: Thanks to the magic of the Internet, you can watch the trick again.
sentences.chinese: 多亏有了互联网的魔力，你可以再看看这个戏法。

sentences.english: Klinsmann was the only player to hit(score)a hat trick in World Cup Final.
sentences.chinese: 克林斯曼是世界杯决赛中唯一上演帽子戏法的球员。

sentences.english: Juggling with four clubs requires mastering the three-club juggle.
sentences.chinese: 有四支球队杂耍需要掌握三个俱乐部变戏法。

sentences.english: He made a fortune through financial legerdemain .
sentences.chinese: 他通过一些资本运作“戏法”发了大财。

sentences.english: But would such a sleight of hand really stand up to legal scrutiny in the aftermath of Armageddon?
sentences.chinese: 但这种戏法真的经得起末日审判的法律审查吗？

sentences.english: This trick demands sleight of hand.
The conjuror's magic delighted the children.
sentences.chinese: 魔术师的戏法逗乐了孩子们。

sentences.english: Broiled chicken disappeared from before us like magic.
sentences.chinese: 烧鸡像变戏法似地从我们眼前消失了。

sentences.english: The juggler was the amazement of the whole city.
sentences.chinese: 变戏法者使市民们叹为观止。

sentences.english: I started doing tricks for the kids at school.
sentences.chinese: 后来，我开始在学校里给其他孩子变戏法。

sentences.english: Please give me your bag and the juggler in it. I will give you a package of gold coins for it.
sentences.chinese: 请把你的口袋和口袋里那个变戏法的给我吧。

sentences.english: They brought back to my mind, in a flash, the thr juggles .
sentences.chinese: 他们顿时使我回想起那三个变戏法的。

definition: to perform conjuring tricks/to conjure/to juggle
pattern/way of doing sth/trick/(sports) fancy-style (as figure skating etc)
to perform magic/to do magic tricks/prestidigitation
to hinder the eyesight/(fig.) to trick into not noticing/to blindfold
variant of 玩意兒|玩意儿[wan2 yi4 r5]
